did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University
did.physloc: Located in locked compact shelving, level 1, shelf 25I.
did.abstract: The RU Athletics Department Media Guides Collection contains official media guides published by the RU Athletics department for use by journalists. To see the full collection details consult the RU Archives finding aid for this collection.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: An appointment for research is required. The collection is open for research. No interlibrary loan.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], RU Athletics Archives, Radford University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University, Radford, VA. RU Athletics Department Media Guides , Accession # RU 9.1, University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: The Media Guides were donated to the Archives by the RU Athletics Department.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The RU Athletics Department Media Guides Collection contains official media guides published by the RU Athletics department for use by journalists. Each issue typically covers one sport and one year, and features player, coach, and staff profiles, as well as schedules and other information. The Media Guides were donated to the Archives by the RU Athletics Department. Sports covered include women's and men's basketball, volleyball, soccer, track and field/ cross country, baseball, softball, golf, swimming and diving, and tennis. Not all years are available.

blockquote.p: Folder 1. Women's Basketball Annual Media Guides - Various Guides from 1980-2005 - Not Inclusive
Folder 2. Men's Basketball Annual Media Guides - Various Guides from 2001-2007 - Not Inclusive
Folder 3. Fall Sports Guide - 1991 - Soccer, Volleyball, Cross County
Folder 8. Track and Field - Men's and Women's - Various years - 2002-2007
Folder 13. Big South Conference Basketball Program - 2000
